title: Clear night, moderate-speed city driving on a straight road with a large building on the left.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving straight on a city street at night.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is straight and has two lanes. There are several parked cars on the right side of the road. A large building with many windows is on the left side of the road. The street is well-lit with streetlights.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is maintaining a moderate speed and keeping a safe distance from the parked cars. It is preparing to make a left turn at the next intersection. The driver is paying attention to the pedestrians walking on the sidewalk and the traffic lights on the corner.
